rev.comment: sorry, but since this is unlikely (there is also another confirmed reason for the date) and completely unsourced, I have to remove it...

Line 141: Line 141:
The current release is [[List of Ubuntu releases#Ubuntu_10.04_LTS_.28Lucid_Lynx.29|10.04 LTS Lucid Lynx]], released on April 29, 2010.
The current release is [[List of Ubuntu releases#Ubuntu_10.04_LTS_.28Lucid_Lynx.29|10.04 LTS Lucid Lynx]], released on April 29, 2010.
â
The next release will be [[Maverick Meerkat|10.10 Maverick Meerkat]], to be released on October 10, 2010. This is a departure from the traditional schedule releasing at the end of October to get the perfect 10<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.markshuttleworth.com/archives/336|title=Shooting for the Perfect 10.10 with Maverick Meerkat |publisher=Mark Shuttleworth |date=2010-04-02 |accessdate=2010-06-08}}</ref>. This is also intentionally done to appeal to the fans of [[The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy]] who all, of course, know that the ultimate answer to ''"life, the universe and everything"'' is 42; which is, co-incidentally, (in binary) 101010 (10.10.10). {{citation needed|july 2010}}
+
The next release will be [[Maverick Meerkat|10.10 Maverick Meerkat]], to be released on October 10, 2010. This is a departure from the traditional schedule releasing at the end of October to get the perfect 10<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.markshuttleworth.com/archives/336|title=Shooting for the Perfect 10.10 with Maverick Meerkat |publisher=Mark Shuttleworth |date=2010-04-02 |accessdate=2010-06-08}}</ref>.
